Name: Vira
Text: (Oh PG look at yourself, a college graduate all set to get into the world, independent.)

Name: Vira
Text: (Now that I think about it it sends shivers down my spine.)

Name: Vira
Text: (Urrghh. Well one thing’s for sure I have to cook my own meal. God!.)

Name: Vira
Text: (Definitely better than canteen food.)

Name: Vira
Text: (I have to stop beating around the bush. It’s the first day of work tomorrow.)

Name: Vira
Text: (Will I be able to do everything properly? What if I’m not able to speak?)

Name: Vira
Text: (I should not keep worrying for no reason!)

Name: Vira
Text: (Calm down Vira. Deep Breath!.)

Name: Ryo
Text: What are you doing?

Name: Vira
Text: Aaaah! Oh it's you.

Name: Ryo
Text: Yes of course it's me. You called me here.

Name: Ryo
Text: Is everything alright? You look like you’re nervous.

Name: Vira
Text: (Right, I did. This is Ryo. I’ve known him since childhood.)

Name: Vira
Text: (He’s been a great friend. Similar interests and great heart.)

Name: Vira
Text: (We've always got each other's back. He will be more than happy to help me out!)

Name: Ryo
Text: Knock,knock anybody there?

Name: Vira
Text: Right, I called you because well…I got into Vetron!

Name: Vira
Text: They said they were impressed by my academic performance and technical knowledge and so they accepted me into the company!

Name: Vira
Text: I finally got into my dream company and my best friend is there too.

Name: Ryo
Text: Oh you got into my company? Amazing! When are you joining? Tomorrow?

Name: Vira
Text: Yes. But there is a problem. I don’t know how to communicate well.

Name: Vira
Text: Team work, speaking to clients, my team lead, all of this seems too difficult.

Name: Vira
Text: Since you have been working for Vetron for a long time….I could really use your help.

Name: Ryo
Text: Happy to help you out! You don’t have to be scared. If you know what to do, it’ll be a breeze.

Name: Ryo
Text: What you have to understand is you have to choose what you want to convey to the people who work with you.

Name: Ryo
Text: You have many choices when it comes to what you have to say.

Name: Ryo
Text: But from a multitude of choices, only a few do the job perfectly.

Name: Vira
Text: Makes sense

Name: Ryo
Text: Great! What I am trying to say is you have to find out what those choices are

Name: Vira
Text: Ok. But how do I do that?

Name: Ryo
Text: First things first, learn the skills you need. Then try to apply those skills into the conversation.

Name: Ryo
Text: Use the skills to determine which choice is best.

Name: Vira
Text: Right….got it. But what are the skills that I’ll need?

Name: Ryo
Text: Yes….let me start with…….wait……

Name: Ryo
Text: There’s quite a lot actually so it might be better if i gave you this.

Name: Vira
Text: A book?

Name: Ryo
Text: Yes it has everything you need. This is what helped me too.

Name: Ryo
Text: -Is there anything else you want to ask me?

Name: Vira
Text: No, nothing else

Name: Ryo
Text: Ok then! I guess you’re all set. You’ve got this. See you at vetron.

Name: Vira
Text: Thanks….

Name: Vira
Text: Ooh gotta go. Anything else you wanted to say?

Name: Ryo
Text: Yes! And it’s very important.

Name: Vira
Text: Yes?

Name: Ryo
Text: Please call me to a place nicer than a metro station next time. Ok?

Name: Vira
Text: Hahaha ok!
